#include <iostream>
#include <string>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    string a,b;
    int t,i,flag,as,arr[26];
    cin >> t;
    while(t--)
    {
        cin >> a >> b;
        i=0;
        while(i<26)
         arr[i++]=0;
        i = 0;
        while(i<a.length())
        {
            char c = a.at(i);
            as = (int) c;
            as = as-97;
            arr[as]+=1;
            i++;
        }
        i = 0;
        while(i<b.length())
        {
            char c = b.at(i);
            as = (int) c;
            as = as-97;
            arr[as]-=1;
            i++;
        }
        i = 0;
        flag = 1;
        while(i<26)
        {
            if(arr[i]!=0)
            {
                flag = 0;
                break;
            }
            i++;
        }
        if(flag==1)
          cout<<"YES"<<endl;
        else
          cout<<"NO"<<endl;

    }
}
